text: There's a ripped note. Let's see what it says.
Well well well, what do we have here? It seems like our perp kept himself to a schedule.
speaker: det

text: I get the feeling that they kept getting distracted by food and drink.
Actually, how did they manage to get those cakes?
Gabo said the suspect somehow managed to take them directly into his stomach even though his hands were to his side.
There aren’t any aliens I’m aware of that have claws, multiple arms or some sort of external stomach storage and fur.
